p3dx_control Documentation

p3dx_control

The p3dx_control package. This is in experimental mode.

  • Homepage: http://wiki.ros.org/p3dx_control

This package contains joint configurations and launchfiles for spawning the joint states of a Pioneer P3-DX mobile base. It also contains a simple utility node for keyboard teleoperation.
